citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3 pm on
16-Feb-17.
Animal Care Inspector left message on phone, honked horn, and waited for 30 min.
